H0.text: who signed the declaration of independence for maryland. Samuel Chase

H1.text: who signed the declaration of independence for maryland. Charles Carroll

H2.text: who signed the declaration of independence for maryland. Thomas Stone

H3.text: who signed the declaration of independence for maryland. William Paca

A4.text: He represented Maryland at the Continental Congress, was re-elected in 1776 and signed the United States Declaration of Independence.

A5.text: Samuel Chase ... was a signer of the United States Declaration of Independence as a representative of Maryland.
